message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which holds immense value for us at $15,000. Considering its worth to you, I propose we strike a fair deal. For this extraordinary opportunity, I am offering the product to you at $13,000. This price not only ensures a beneficial transaction for both parties but also allows you to acquire an asset valued at $15,000 for a reasonable investment. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to facilitate this valuable exchange.
